scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm dev:middleman" "cd mcpmark && .venv/bin/python -m pipeline --mcp filesystem --models gpt-5 --tasks music_report --k 1" --names "middleman,benchmark" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow"
scripts.dev:benchmark: concurrently "pnpm dev:middleman" "cd mcpmark && .venv/bin/python -m pipeline --mcp filesystem --models gpt-5 --tasks all --k 1 --max-workers 8" --names "middleman,benchmark" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow"
